thread.title: Frost & Sullivan Hosts Flagship GIL Summit in Indonesia for the 4th Consecutive Year
thread.title_full: Frost & Sullivan Hosts Flagship GIL Summit in Indonesia for the 4th Consecutive Year - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Frost & Sullivan Hosts Flagship GIL Summit in Indonesia for the 4th Consecutive Year
text:
Frost & Sullivan
JAKARTA, Indonesia , Oct. 2, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Frost & Sullivan today hosted its flagship summit – Growth, Innovation & Leadership (GIL) Indonesia at the Shangri-La Hotel in Jakarta .
Spike Choo , Country Director, Frost & Sullivan Indonesia said that it was a pleasure meeting and hosting Indonesia's top business executives at GIL Indonesia this year.
"We are inspired and even more enthused about the unlimited potential that exists in our quest for excellence driven by all the monumental and innovative visionary perspectives. Such potential is being shared in more than 20 countries around the globe, by nearly 1 million business executives from 33 industries and 10 critical career functions for driving growth," he added.
Spike Choo said that Frost & Sullivan's GIL Global continues to be the only network of its kind supporting innovative, futuristic and visionary thinking to grow companies and careers.
Frost & Sullivan's team of analysts, Rudy Pranatia, Vita Andini and Daniel Wicaksana, shared their views on Mega Trends: Indonesia Perspective.
Frost & Sullivan's key analysts in Asia Pacific also shared their latest research findings in the GIL Bytes Presentation, a rapid-fire session. Topics presented include:
Future of Government Medical Tourism – Expanding Horizons Meet the Smart Cities of the Future: Rethink Your Customer, Your Solutions & Your Strategy Indonesia's Logistics Growth Opportunities: Towards ASEAN Economic Community Palm Oil & Downstream Outlook 2020 Internet of Things Healthcare Policies in ASEAN: Impact & Opportunities Connecting on Content: The Future of Marketing Apart from Frost & Sullivan's speakers, Setiaji, Head of Technical Implementation Unit, Jakarta Smart City, Department of Communications, Information and Public Relations, DKI Jakarta Province also delivered his presentation on Meet The Smart Cities of The Future: "Rethink Your Customer, Your Solutions and Your Strategy" along with Spike Choo as ICT Director, Frost & Sullivan Asia Pacific. In his presentation, Setiaji showed how he and his officials plan to bring Jakarta into a global metropolis using technology and social media.
Theodore Permadi Rachmat, Founder of Triputra Group also shared his experiences in the Legends of Indonesia panel. Romeo Fernandez Lledo, President Director of Siloam Hospitals, Ririek Ardiansyah, CEO of Telkomsel, Johari Zein , Founder & Director of TIKI JNE Jakarta, Endang Rachmawati , Country Director of Avaya Indonesia, and Anthonius Henricus , Developer Experience & Evangelism Director of Microsoft Indonesia also attended the congress as panelists on Convergence and Connected The World.
Frost & Sullivan's GIL in Asia Pacific will continue its journey with stops in Singapore on October 15 th , 2015 and Sydney on December 3 rd , 2015.
GIL 2015: Indonesia was held in cooperation with members of the Frost & Sullivan Growth Partner Alliance. Members of this global alliance of world-class growth solution providers, non-profits, associations, and media partners include BrightTALK, Eloqua, Lenos Software, The Association of International Product Marketing and Management (AIPMM), Appropedia, Business Marketing Association (BMA), Carbon War Room, Clean Technology & Sustainable Industries Organization (CTSI), greeenstar.org, Strategic and The Society of Competitive Intelligence Professionals (SCIP), BoogarLists, Business Review India, ConferenceGuru, Connect-World, Enterprise Technology Management (ETM), Exec Digital, Innovation Management Magazine, Technology Digital, and Toolbox.com.
Metro TV is the Official TV Partner for Frost & Sullivan's GIL 2015: Indonesia and Forbes Indonesia is the Official Media Partner for Frost & Sullivan's GIL 2015: Indonesia and while Media Partners include Asia Pacific Biotech News, Asia Research News, Asian Century Institute, Developing Telecoms, and EMIS.
About Frost & Sullivan
Frost & Sullivan, the Growth Partnership Company, works in collaboration with clients to leverage visionary innovation that addresses the global challenges and related growth opportunities that will make or break today's market participants.
For more than 50 years, we have been developing growth strategies for the global 1000, emerging businesses, the public sector and the investment community. Is your organization prepared for the next profound wave of industry convergence, disruptive technologies, increasing competitive intensity, Mega Trends, breakthrough best practices, changing customer dynamics and emerging economies?
